attack(Vector2, Vector2) - Method in class com.berbils.game.entities.projectilespawner.SpokeProjectileSpawner
Spawns a set number of projectiles in a spoke pattern, the number of spokes being depdendant upon pre-defined variables.Then increments the spawn position so the spokes shift slightly round in a circle, spawning at a slightly different point next attack call.Also updates the last time a projectile was spawned to limit fire rate.
